page.title: 14PRIVATE HOUSING IN COLWYN
page.content: There is a wide variety of private housing available in Colwyn Bay.It ranges from mid_terrace Victorian houses in need of modernisation to spacious, detached properties in beautiful grounds with views across the Bay.Prices start at Just under {Â£10 000}and go up to over{Â£100 000. The largest new development of houses in the area is{Colwyn Heights. This is set above the town and has rapidly increased in size in recent years. A shop and a pub serve the community and a{new school}is soon to be built there. The trade in houses is well catered for as there are ten estate agents in Colwyn Bay. The usual commission on the sale of a property is 1.5% of the purchase price plus V.A.T plus advertising expenses.
